hero.name: Carlos Hernández
hero.self-description: Software developer with over 3 years of experience in designing and implementing efficient and scalable technological solutions, focused on solving complex problems and enhancing user experience.

projects.gym-description: Gym Fitness Web is a frontend application built with React that provides a modern, dynamic, and motivational experience for a gym. It features interactive sections such as plans, classes, trainers, and a blog, with a minimalist, professional, and responsive design that reflects the fitness lifestyle.
projects.savingsfund-description: The Savings Fund - Management System is a web application designed to manage a community savings fund, facilitating the control of contributions, loans, investments, and member information. It offers an overview of the fund’s status and tools to efficiently manage financial resources and transactions.
projects.moto-viewer-description: The Interactive 360° Viewer is a web application that allows users to view objects from every angle through preloaded images. It provides a smooth and intuitive experience with rotation, zoom, and navigation controls for both PC and mobile devices, combining modern design and high visual performance.
